name: バグだらけの村
description:
Can you find all the bugs?
A spot-the-difference action game compatible with VRM!
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
A village where people live peacefully
It was supposed to be, but before I knew it, it was full of bugs! ?

Villagers' actions, conversations, appearance, etc.
There are changes in various places!

Find out what happened to the village
Let's get back to the original state!
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
[Genre]
exploration action game

[Game content]
Many villagers live in the village.
There are 5 bugs hidden in it.
His head is getting bigger and his arms are getting longer.
The conversational sentences are strange, and the actions are strange.
Explore the village and find 5 hidden bugs
Let's get things back to normal!
The game is cleared when you find them all.
There are 35 types of bugs in total, and they change every time you start the game.

[VRM compatible]
You can play with your own avatar

play time
1 play: around 5 minutes (1 play has 5 bugs)
Until ED: around 30 minutes
